title: 2 periods in the same month? Period or Istihadah (15 days+), Yellow spotting assim al hakeem JAL
transcript:
[Questioner] from the UK my question is so this 
month my period lasted for like 15 days because   I was having hard time determining my purity 
and because I've seen I'm some discharge at   the end when I was expecting my Purity but then 
the discharge was a bit more yellowish than the   usual one but it wasn't majorly yellow yellow like 
really thick yellow and I was having symptoms of   like infection around that time and so I completed 
like the whole 15 days and then I took ghusl and   now I'm gonna have like I'm getting spottings 
which means that I'm gonna get my period like   so very soon and it's not even 15 days after the 
time I took ghusl so if I get the flow of blood   right now before 15 days finish will that be my 
period will that be istihaada first of all you   should have inserted a tampon when the flow of 
the blood ended and if it came out with nothing   or with light yellowish color that is similar to 
your normal vaginal discharges then this would   have been your sign of Purity you should not 
have waited 15 days unless it was brownish or   real yellowish discharge that is associated with 
uh your menses however the scholars say that in 30   days you must not have more than 15 days of Menses 
and it seems to me that you have miscalculated it   due to the fact that you've prolonged it without 
making certain that this is your infection or this   is your period or this is your normal vaginal 
discharges so yes if you have the flow of blood   you should consider this to be your normal Menses 
providing that it has the same characteristics   and features and only wait until the flow of 
the blood stops and you get these yellowish   discharges you should follow what I had told you 
earlier about the tampons and Allah Knows Best and have you ever taken a counseling session with 
me go to my website and you will find counseling   sessions and apply for one if you can afford it 
that's good for you if you cannot you're entitled   for one free session and this is for everybody 
if they can affirm by Allah that they cannot   afford it because they're poor I'll give them 
one free session without a problem a full half   an hour so come to me and let's speak about 
it inshallah within the following two days   or three days I will uh try and seek Allah's 
guidance to solve the problem once and for All foreign
